author: andschwa
body:
Need to import our backlog of issues from VSO.

We can link an Excel spreadsheet to the VSO team to get the issues, then export to CSV, and import to GitHub using [Octokit](https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb).

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Wrote a small tool to assist with doing this over the weekend. I'll test the VSO issues import on a private repo, run it by people, and then do the real deal. I expect to have this done in an hour or so.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Going to perform the import of VSO issues to GitHub tonight. If you don't want 400+ emails I would recommend temporarily setting GitHub settings to not email notifications.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: We didn't end up importing last night as, after a conversation with GitHub support, we were pointed to an unreleased-but-available new API endpoint that allows bulk importing without sending 17,000+ emails and that will allow us to keep the original creation date and creator. @ealexjordan is updating the importer.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Everything moved over to GitHub successfully. All VSO imported issues are labeled with "VSO Import." There's probably a bit of clean up to do, but everything came over correctly. Closing issue.

title: Import issues from VSO
